      public static Appointment addAppt(int id, String title, String description, String location, String type, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, int custId, int userId, int contactId)
      Method used to add an appointment to the database
      Parameters:
      id - Appointment ID
      title - Appointment Title
      description - Appointment Description
      location - Appointment Location
      type - Appointment Type
      start - Appointment Start Time
      end - Appointment End Time
      custId - Appointment for Customer ID
      userId - Appointment from User ID
      contactId - Appointment with Contact ID
      Returns:
      the added appointment, to be sent to Reports
